April 2, 2016

Who is Tin Cup Digital?

Welcome to Tin Cup Digital. We’re so glad you’re here!

We’re New England’s Newest Web Agency for Small Businesses

Tin Cup Digital is where small business owners across New England can come for custom web design, brand identity, and online marketing.

Why Do We Focus on Small Businesses?

In general, small business owners have fewer dollars, less internal support, and less time to manage the internet-side of their business. If you own a small business, you maintain the staff you need to make your daily operations run right.

You don’t have an in-house marketing team, or a web designer, or an SEO consultant, either. But you still have a need for a professional, scalable, and modern web presence.

That’s where we come in. We choose to focus on small businesses because that’s where we saw the most potential. Plus, we know the unique challenges small business owners face—we are one! Here’s just a few of the web services we offer small businesses like yours:

Web Design & Development

  • Mobile-friendly (responsive) websites that look great on any device
  • Intuitive, fields-driven WordPress CMS for easy content updates
  • Custom layouts you can’t achieve with “website builders”
  • Ongoing support for additional functionality, page-types, etc.

Online Marketing & SEO

  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) to influence how and where you show up in Google
  • Social media account set-up/revamp
  • Inbound marketing strategy, buyer persona development, and daily-use guide
  • Development of marketing assets like blog posts, emails, downloadable resources

Brand Identity & Graphic Design

  • Custom logo design
  • Brand guidelines
  • Vision statement and mission statement
  • Tone, voice, and personality
  • Value proposition

Want to learn more? Click below to let us know how we can help. We can’t wait to help you take your small business to big places!

How Can We Help You?

Whether you need a new website, a brand identity refresh, or more search engine traffic, it’s time we talked.

Let's Talk!
